text: hdha alquran dhikr wshrf lak -ayha alrswl- wlqwmk. wa'iin li'ahl taqwaa allah wtaeth lahsn masir eindana fi janaat 'iqamt, mfttaht lahum abwabha, mutakiiyn fiha ealaa al'arayik almzyanat, yatlubun maa yashtahun min 'anwae alfwakh alkathirat walshrab, min kuli ma tashtahih nfwshm, wtldhh aeynhm
